pufferlib.emulation module¶

class pufferlib.emulation.Binding(env_cls=None, env_creator=None, default_args=[], default_kwargs={}, env_name=None, feature_parser=None, reward_shaper=None, env_includes_reset=False, emulate_flat_obs=True, emulate_flat_atn=True, emulate_const_horizon=1024, emulate_const_num_agents=True, suppress_env_prints=True, record_episode_statistics=True, obs_dtype=<class 'numpy.float32'>)¶

Bases: object

Base class for PufferLib bindings

Parameters:

  • env_name – Name of the environment

  • env_cls – Environment class to wrap

  • env_args – Arguments for env_cls

  • env_kwargs – Keyword arguments for env_cls

pufferlib.emulation.unpack_batched_obs(obs_space, packed_obs)¶

Unpack a batch of observations into the original observation space

Call this funtion in the forward pass of your network
